T02TD3039E:81b-0: @81b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3039E:81b-1: mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa'i sems can la phan thogs par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02TD3039E:81b-2: klu chen po brgyad mchod par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bzhengs la ral gri dang /
T02TD3039E:81b-3: mda' rnams kyis mtha' ma bskor la /
T02TD3039E:81b-4: dbus su gtso bo'i bum pa btsugs la /
T02TD3039E:81b-6: padma'i 'dab ma rnams kyi steng du klu so so'i gzugs brnyan bkod pa dang /
T02TD3039E:81b-7: so so'i gtor ma dkar gsum mngar gsum dang /
T02TD3039E:81b-8: mi sman sna tshogs pa dang ldan par yang bsham mo //
T02TD3039E:81b-9: dkon mchog dang klu rnams mchod pa'i lha bshos dang /
T02TD3039E:81b-10: mar me la sogs pa mchod pa'i bye brag ci 'byor pa rnams bsham mo //
T02TD3039E:81b-11: phyogs skyong dang bgegs rnams la gtor ma bsham zhing gtang ngo //
T02TD3039E:81b-12: de nas klu chen po rnams so so'i gnas su spyan drang pa ni /
T02TD3039E:81b-13: h'um rgya mtsho yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas //
T02TD3039E:81b-15: au li ka dang nor rgyas dang //
T02TD3039E:81b-16: padma dang ni ba su na //
T02TD3039E:81b-17: klu chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas //
T02TD3039E:81b-18: btsun mo rnams kyis mgul nas 'khyud //
T02TD3039E:81b-19: yab yum sras dang bcas pa rnams //
T02TD3039E:81b-23: de nas bstod cing gtor ma dbul ba ni /
T02TD3039E:81b-24: h'um shar phyogs klu rgyal mtha' yas ni //
T02TD3039E:81b-26: phyag mtshan padma zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD3039E:81b-27: spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang //
T02TD3039E:81b-28: sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can //
T02TD3039E:81b-29: sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD3039E:81b-30: de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi //
T02TD3039E:81b-31: lho phyogs klu rgyal 'jog po ni //
T02TD3039E:81b-32: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smad sbrul //
T02TD3039E:81b-34: phyag mtshan padma zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD3039E:82a-2: sprul mgo bdun gyis gdengs ka can //
T02TD3039E:82a-3: sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD3039E:82a-4: de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi //
T02TD3039E:82a-5: nub phyogs klu dbang karko ta //
T02TD3039E:82a-6: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smad sbrul //
T02TD3039E:82a-8: phyag mtshan padma zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD3039E:82a-9: spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang //
T02TD3039E:82a-10: sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can //
T02TD3039E:82a-11: sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD3039E:82a-12: de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi //
T02TD3039E:82a-13: byang phyogs klu rgyal au li ka / zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smad sbrul //
T02TD3039E:82a-15: phyag mtshan padma zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD3039E:82a-16: spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang //
T02TD3039E:82a-17: sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can //
T02TD3039E:82a-18: sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD3039E:82a-19: de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi //
T02TD3039E:82a-20: shar lhor klu rgyal nor rgyas ni //
T02TD3039E:82a-21: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smad sbrul //
T02TD3039E:82a-23: phyag mtshan padma zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD3039E:82a-24: spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang //
T02TD3039E:82a-25: sbrul mgo mdun gyi gdengs ka can //
T02TD3039E:82a-26: sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD3039E:82a-27: de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi //
T02TD3039E:82a-28: lho nub klu rgyal dung skyong ni //
T02TD3039E:82a-29: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smad sbrul //
T02TD3039E:82a-31: phyag mtshan padma zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD3039E:82a-32: spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang //
T02TD3039E:82a-33: sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can //
T02TD3039E:82a-34: sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD3039E:82a-35: de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi //
T02TD3039E:82a-36: nub byang klu rgyal padma ni //
T02TD3039E:82a-37: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smad sbrul //
T02TD3039E:82a-39: phyag mtshan padma zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD3039E:82a-40: spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang //
T02TD3039E:82a-41: sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can //
T02TD3039E:82a-42: sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD3039E:82a-43: de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi //
T02TD3039E:82a-44: byang shar klu rgyal ba ra na //
T02TD3039E:82a-45: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smad sbrul //
T02TD3039E:82a-47: phyag mtshan padma zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD3039E:82a-48: spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang //
T02TD3039E:82a-49: sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can //
T02TD3039E:82a-50: sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD3039E:82a-51: de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi //
T02TD3039E:82b-0: @82b so so'i yum gyi sku mdog ni //
T02TD3039E:82b-1: rang rang yab dang mthun pa la //
T02TD3039E:82b-2: rin chen phreng ba'i do shal can //
T02TD3039E:82b-3: g-yas g-yon yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud //
T02TD3039E:82b-4: kha rlangs dug tu 'khyil bar byed //
T02TD3039E:82b-5: de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi //
T02TD3039E:82b-6: de dag so so'i sras rnams ni //
T02TD3039E:82b-9: la la chu srin kha nas 'byung //
T02TD3039E:82b-10: de bzhin sbrul dang sbal pa dang //
T02TD3039E:82b-11: chu glang chu rta kha nas 'byung //
T02TD3039E:82b-12: sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i gzugs rnams la //
T02TD3039E:82b-13: mchod pa 'dul zhing bstod par bgyi //
T02TD3039E:82b-14: gzhan yang klu bran 'bum gyi tshogs //
T02TD3039E:82b-15: byol song gzugs brnyan sna tshogs ston //
T02TD3039E:82b-17: rkang mangs dang ni rkang med dang //
T02TD3039E:82b-18: sdig srin gzugs brnyan ston pa la //
T02TD3039E:82b-19: mchod cing bstod nas gtor ma 'bul //
T02TD3039E:82b-20: bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu rnams //
T02TD3039E:82b-21: ji ltar 'dod pa ji bzhin du //
T02TD3039E:82b-22: khyed kyis 'dod don grub par mdzed //
T02TD3039E:82b-23: ces klu brgyad kyi snying po brgya rtsa bzlas la gtor ma gtong zhing snying po rgyas bsdus kyi bum pa'i chus khrus bya'o //
T02TD3039E:82b-24: de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing bkra shis gsol lo //
T02TD3039E:82b-25: klu chen po brgyad mchod pas mi bzad pa'i nad yams drag po las thar bar byed pa /
T02TD3039E:82b-26: dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
